臨床題幹的例子（引言和句子完成）用於開發高認知水平的測試項目
Examples of questions (lead-in and sentence completion) used with clinical stems to develop test items with higher cognitive levels
評估結果中，以下哪一項表明需要進一步的評估？
AssessmentWhich of the following findings indicates a need for further assessment?
哪一項評估結果是優先關注的？
Which assessment finding is a PRIORITY concern?

The MOST important history information is…
以下哪個問題是最合適的初步問題？
Which of the following would be the MOST appropriate initial question?
以下哪一項是從這個孩子身上收集的最重要資訊？
Which of the following is the MOST important piece of information to gather from this child?
從這些數據中應該如何解讀？
What should be interpreted from this data?
以下哪些檢查應該進行？
Which of the following tests should be ordered?

Which of the following abnormal findings should be expected when performing the assessment?
以下哪一項發現需要進一步調查？
Which of the following findings needs further investigation?
以下哪一項是預期的發現？
Which of the following is an expected finding?
最重要的考慮因素是什麼？
Which is the MOST important factor to consider?
這個孩子的實驗室檢查結果中，哪一個是預期的？
Which of the following laboratory results would be expected for this child?

Which of the following symptoms would be expected with this diagnosis?
